Describe a new site

Source: R/db_describe_site.R
db_describe_site.Rd

Describe a new site

db_describe_site(db, site_code, sitetypecv = "Site", site_name = NULL,
  site_description = NULL)

Arguments

db

database connection object
site_code

unique short code name (required)
sitetypecv

site type from [controlled vocab](http://vocabulary.odm2.org/samplingfeaturetype/) such as "Site" or "Weather station"
site_name

optional longer site name
site_description

optional longer site description

Value

message that site was added

Examples

# just add site name
db <- rodm2::connect_sqlite()
db_describe_site(db, site_code = "new_site")
#> Site new_site has been entered into the samplingfeatures table.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
  • Examples
